劫.definition: to rob; to plunder; to seize by force; to coerce; calamity; abbr. for kalpa 劫波[jie2 bo1]

劫囚.definition: to break a prisoner out of jail

劫奪.definition: to seize by force; to abduct

劫富濟貧.definition: to rob the rich to help the poor

劫寨.definition: to seize a stronghold; to surprise the enemy in his camp

劫後餘生.definition: (idiom) to be a survivor of a calamity

劫持.definition: to kidnap; to hijack; to abduct; to hold under duress

劫數難逃.definition: Destiny is inexorable, there is no fleeing it (idiom). Your doom is at hand.

劫營.definition: to seize a camp; to surprise the enemy in bed

劫獄.definition: to break into jail; to forcibly release prisoners
